::: {.notes}
Hello, Thank you for being here.  I'm Jinseob Kim, CEO of Zarathu Company. I’m going to talk about my business and what we can do together. 

Let’s start by introducing my service. Zarathu provide analytic services for medical research. Firstly, We develop web-based statistical software that doctors can easily analyze without install. Korea has high-quality public health big data at the national level, so doctors do many studies with this data. For example, National Health Insurance Service(NHIS) and Health Insurance Review & Assessment Service(HIRA) support big data research using their data.

We also provide statistical consulting and education for doctors, researchers and students.

:::


## Medical data is important

There are tears of patients and doctors in **Medical data**

-   Data $\rightarrow$ knowledge & technology 
-   Better data analysis saves lives


::: {.notes}
I think you can ask one question. "Do we need this work?" To answer the question, let's start with medical data.

There are tears of patients and doctors in **Medical data**. Using medical data, We can find knowledge and develop technology for human life. Better data analysis saves lives, but we don't use the data, more patients suffer.



:::
